section.title: Editing
section.para: The model describing the symbols and views is an Ecore model, which is documented in . Eclipse SCADA Provides a set of tools (Wizards, Editors) in order to ease the development symbols. However it still is possible to edit the symbols with a plain text or XML editor.

section.title: Preview
section.para: In order to see a preview of the complete view, including embedded symbols the Visual Interface Preview editor has to be opened. This can be done using the context menu of the appropriate file and Open withVisual Interface Preview.
